roleset.name: to impose or collect
roleset.note: LEVY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'levy' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from levy.01-v predicate notes)
LEVY-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to levy.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from levy.01-n)

role.descr: levied on what? entity being taxed

example.name: transitive
example.text: Still , Hugo 's impact may revive unsuccessful proposals [*] to give [local governments]-1 authority [*]-1 to levy sales taxes .

example.name: With Arg 2
example.text: Specific measures might include *PRO* raising the highway tax and aviation fuel tax, as well as levying special taxes on appliances that consume excessive resources.
example.arg: on appliances that consume excessive resources

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: an erroneous IRS levy on a bank account

example.name: arg 1 as a type of tax
example.text: The petroleum gain levy on sales
